newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil real ends off 0.06 pct in calm trading.
newsitem.headline: Brazil real ends off 0.06 pct in calm trading.

text.p: Brazil's real dropped 0.06 percent to end at 1.0147 per dollar in the commercial foreign exchange market, dealers said.
Preliminary figures for commercial and financial foreign exchange contracts showed a Wednesday surplus of around $120 million in late afternoon, traders said.
In the interbank floating rate market, the real fell 0.04 percent to end at 1.0190 to the dollar.
In the illegal parallel market, the real close at 1.035 per greenback, down 0.19 percent.
